Sri Lankabhimanya Christopher Gregory Weeramantry, AM (17 Nọvemba 1926 意 5 Jenụwarị 2017) bụ onye ọka iwu Sri Lanka bụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Ikpe Mba Nile (ICJ) site n'afọ 1991 ruo afọ 2000, na-eje ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche ya site n'afọ 1997 ruo afọ 2000

Weeramantry bụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Sri Lanka site n'afọ 1967 ruo afọ 1972. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ emeritus na Mahadum Monash na dịka onye isi oche nke International Association of Lawyers against Nuclear Arms.
